title: How many Harry Potter books were sold per year, per book? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think Harry Potter books were one of the fastest selling ones, cant say the exact number, but they were really went out of stock immaedietly after their release, specially the last book "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows". But I think the answer to your question can be found here.  Harry Potter – History of the Books  Cheers ✌
